languages.text: Находились те, кто шептался об особой, темной и порочной связи Вольного Торговца и Маражая. О тайных стыковках ксеносских кораблей с флагманом фон Валанциус, о кровавых ночах, полнящихся криками жертв и смехом безумцев, связанных одним сумасшествием на двоих, и о чудовищных следах вакханалий, что оставляли после себя любовники.
languages.translation_comment:
игрок не хаосит
Не тру романс

languages.text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.
languages.original_text: Находились те, кто шептался об особой, темной и порочной связи Вольного Торговца и Маражая. О тайных стыковках ксеносских кораблей с флагманом фон Валанциус, о кровавых ночах, полнящихся криками жертв и смехом безумцев, связанных одним сумасшествием на двоих, и о чудовищных следах вакханалий, что оставляли после себя любовники.

traits.locale_text: Some would whisper of a special, dark and sinful bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai. Of secret dockings of xenos ships with von Valancius's flagship, of bloody nights full of the screams of victims and laughter of maniacs sharing one madness between the two, and of macabre traces of the orgies that the lovers left behind.

Some would whisper of a special, dark and sinful bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai. Of secret dockings of xenos ships with von Valancius's flagship, of bloody nights full of the screams of victims and laughter of maniacs sharing one madness between the two, and of macabre traces of the orgies that the lovers left behind.

Some whispered of a special, dark, and sinful bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of the secret dockings of xenos ships with von Valancius's flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

Some whispered of a special, dark, and sinful bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of the secret dockings of xenos ships with von Valancius's flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

languages.text: 有人私下里说，行商浪人与玛拉斋之间存在某种黑暗而邪恶的特殊联结……那个异形的舰船偶尔会与冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰秘密停靠在一起。在那些血腥的夜晚，舰船上满是受害者的尖叫声与疯狂的大笑声，以及这对爱人狂欢时留下的恐怖痕迹。
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: 有人私下里说，行商浪人与玛拉斋之间存在某种黑暗而邪恶的特殊联结……那个异形的舰船偶尔会与冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰秘密停靠在一起。在那些血腥的夜晚，舰船上满是受害者的尖叫声与疯狂的大笑声，以及这对爱人狂欢时留下的恐怖痕迹。

languages.text: Einige munkelten, dass es eine besondere, finstere und böse Verbindung zwischen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und Marazhai gebe ... dass Xenos-Schiffe heimlich am Valancius-Flaggschiff andockten ... dass es blutige Nächte gebe, in denen man die Wahnsinnigen wie im Delirium lachen und ihre Opfer vor Qualen schreien höre ... dass die Orgien des Liebespaares makabre Spuren hinterließen.
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: Einige munkelten, dass es eine besondere, finstere und sündige Verbindung zwischen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und Marazhai gebe ... dass Xenos-Schiffe heimlich am Valancius-Flaggschiff andockten ... dass es blutige Nächte gebe, in denen man die Wahnsinnigen wie im Delirium lachen und ihre Opfer vor Qualen schreien höre ... dass die Orgien des Liebespaares makabre Spuren hinterließen.

languages.text: Certains évoquaient à demi-mot le lien singulier, sordide et immoral qui unissait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à Marazhai... On parlait également de vaisseaux xénos s'amarrant en secret au vaisseau amiral von Valancius, de nuits sanglantes sur fond de hurlements de terreur et de rires déments, et des traces macabres des orgies auxquelles s'adonnaient les amants.
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: Certains évoquaient à demi-mot le lien singulier, sordide et immoral qui unissait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à Marazhai... On parlait également de vaisseaux xénos qui s’amarraient en secret au vaisseau amiral von Valancius, de nuits sanglantes sur fond de hurlements de terreur et de rires déments, et des traces macabres des orgies auxquelles s’adonnaient les amants.

languages.text: Algunos susurran sobre un vínculo especial, oscuro y malévolo entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y Marazhai... sobre los atraques secretos de naves xenos en la nave insignia von Valancius, sobre noches sangrientas cargadas de los gritos de las víctimas y la risa delirante de los maníacos, sobre los restos macabros que dejaban las orgías de los amantes.
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: Algunos susurran sobre un vínculo especial, oscuro y pecaminoso entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y Marazhai... sobre los atraques secretos de naves xenos en la nave insignia von Valancius, sobre noches sangrientas cargadas de los gritos de las víctimas y la risa delirante de los maníacos, sobre los restos macabros que dejaban las orgías de los amantes.

languages.text: ある者は、自由開拓者とマラズハイの間の特別で、陰鬱で、邪悪な絆があるとささやいた。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦と異種族の船が密かに停泊していたこと、血みどろの夜に犠牲者の悲鳴と狂人同士の譫言のような笑い声が絶えなかったこと、恋人たちが残した乱交の不気味な痕跡のことを。
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: ある者は、自由開拓者とマラズハイの間の特別で、陰鬱で、邪悪な絆があるとささやいた。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦と異種族の船が密かに停泊していたこと、血みどろの夜に犠牲者の悲鳴と狂人同士の譫言のような笑い声が絶えなかったこと、恋人たちが残した乱交の不気味な痕跡のことを。

languages.text: Bazıları Hür Tacir ve Marazhai arasında özel, karanlık ve kötücül bir bağ olduğunu söylüyordu. Zeno gemilerinin gizlice von Valancius sancak gemisinde konakladığı, kurbanların çığlıklarıyla ve manyakça kahkahalarla dolu kanlı gecelerin yaşandığı, âşıkların çılgın seks partileri verip arkalarında ölüler bıraktığı konuşuluyordu.
languages.original_text: Some whispered of a special, dark, and wicked bond between the Rogue Trader and Marazhai... of xenos ships secretly docking with the von Valancius flagship, of bloody nights full of screaming victims and delirious laughter shared between maniacs, of macabre traces of the orgies the lovers left behind.

traits.locale_text: Bazıları Hür Tacir ve Marazhai arasında özel, karanlık ve kötücül bir bağ olduğunu söylüyordu. Zeno gemilerinin gizlice von Valancius sancak gemisine girdiği, kurbanların çığlıklarıyla ve manyakça kahkahalarla dolu kanlı gecelerin yaşandığı, âşıkların çılgın seks partileri yapıp arkalarında ölüler bıraktıkları konuşuluyordu.

languages.translation_comment:
игрок не хаосит
Не тру романс
